criteria: Questioning and Answering about Key Details
descriptions: Student does not ask or answer questions about the text.
Student attempts to ask or answer questions but demonstrates little understanding of the text's key details, even with significant prompting and support.
With significant prompting and support, the student can ask or answer basic questions about the text but struggles to identify key details consistently.
With some prompting and support, the student can ask and answer questions about some key details in the text.
The student can ask and answer relevant questions about most key details in the text with minimal prompting and support.
The student independently and accurately asks and answers insightful questions about key details in the text, demonstrating a strong understanding.
